pages.text: Shroomloin can be found in the Crimson Forest.$(br2)They shoot Ascus Bombs that explode and produce an Infectious Poison, spreading among entities that brush against one another and killing them. On death the may drop Ascus Bombs.$(br2)Be careful, these creatures will attack you if you dare to damage the Crimson Forest,
that includes breaking any of the blocks found withit it besides Crimson Nylium and Shroomlights.
